entry.title: NOI2014魔法森林
entry.content:
数据结构,这是坠吼滴.

原题求一条双关键字最小瓶颈路径,从1到n.

如果本题是单关键字的话很好办,直接用kruskal的做法处理最小生成树即可.

双关键字如何处理呢?

先按a为关键字排序,然后加入一条边时会形成一个环,找到环上b最大的断开,然后如果点1和点n联通就更新答案.

entry.title: NOIP十大难题
entry.content:
自从本蒟蒻知道有NOIP这个比赛以后,就一直非常慌,害怕爆零,结果还是爆零了.

那么NOIP有趣的题目都有什么呢qwq…

TOP 10. NOIP2012 疫情控制

花了一上午敲完又花了一节课卡进1s其实是因为心态崩了干脆开了O2优化

这道题的想法是

(暴力)

枚举所花费的时间,然后让军队暴力地向上跳

发现这两步都能优化

如果TTT秒可以部署完所有军队,T+1T+1T+1显然也行,只是浪费一些

据此可以二分答案.

然后跳跃也可以像找LCA那样倍增预处理

然后还需要一步贪心:

对于一个点,如果军队还能走的步数多,那么优先考虑用这些军队去建立检查站.

蒟蒻的代码

TOP 9. NOIP2017 逛公园

世界上最遥远的距离,就是我和正解只差了一个map.

建反图,对于每个点以其为起点,用更改权值的k搜过去,统计答案.

TOP 8 NOIP2012 开车旅行

70%直接模拟

100% 维护每个人走2的若干次方步能到哪里.

注意内存.

#include<algorithm>#include<cctype>#include<cmath>#include<cstdio>#include<cstdlib>#include<cstring>#include<iostream>#include<ctime>#include<set>#include<queue>#include<stack>#include<vector>#define size 300010#define inf 10000000000000#define gc getchar()#define db double#define ll long long#define rep(i,s,n) for (register ll i=s;i<=n;i++)#define drep(i,n,s) for (register ll i=n;i>=s;i--)#define il inlineusing namespace std;il ll r(){    char c; ll x,f=1;    for (c=gc;!isdigit(c);c=gc) if (c=='-') f=-1; x=c-'0';    for (c=gc;isdigit(c);c=gc) x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';    return f*x;}struct city{    ll id; ll alt;    friend bool operator<(city a,city b)    {        return a.alt<b.alt;    }};ll n;ll a[size],went[size][25][5],ago[size][25][3],bgo[size][25][3],X0;multiset<city> M;void calc(ll S,ll &disa,ll &disb,ll x0){    ll now=S;    for (ll k=18;k>=0;k--)        if (went[now][k][0]&&disa+disb+ago[now][k][0]+bgo[now][k][0]<=x0)        {            disa+=ago[now][k][0];            disb+=bgo[now][k][0];            now=went[now][k][0];        }}void init(){    for(ll i=n;i;i--)    {        ll goa,gob;       city aa;        aa.id=i,aa.alt=a[i];        M.insert(aa);        multiset<city>::iterator it=M.lower_bound(aa);        ll pre,nxt;        ll preh,nxth;        it++; nxt=(*it).id; nxth=(*it).alt;         it--; it--; pre=(*it).id; preh=(*it).alt;         it++;        if(abs(nxth-a[i])>=abs(preh-a[i])){            gob=pre;            it--;it--;            if(abs(nxth-a[i])>=abs((*it).alt-a[i])) goa=(*it).id;            else goa=nxt;        }        else{            gob=nxt;            it++;it++;            if(abs(preh-a[i])>abs((*it).alt-a[i])) goa=(*it).id;            else goa=pre;        }        went[i][0][0]=goa;        went[i][0][1]=gob;        ago[i][0][0]=abs(a[i]-a[goa]);        ago[i][1][0]=ago[i][0][0];        bgo[i][0][1]=abs(a[i]-a[gob]);        bgo[i][1][1]=bgo[i][0][1];            }    rep(i,1,n)    {        went[i][1][0]=went[went[i][0][0]][0][1];        ago[i][1][0]=ago[i][0][0];        bgo[i][1][0]=abs(a[went[i][1][0]]-a[went[i][0][0]]);        went[i][1][1]=went[went[i][0][1]][0][0];        bgo[i][1][1]=bgo[i][0][1];        ago[i][1][1]=abs(a[went[i][1][1]]-a[went[i][0][1]]);    }}void bz(){    rep(k,2,18)        rep(i,1,n)        {            went[i][k][1]=went[went[i][k-1][1]][k-1][1];            bgo[i][k][1]=bgo[went[i][k-1][1]][k-1][1]+bgo[i][k-1][1];            ago[i][k][1]=ago[went[i][k-1][1]][k-1][1]+ago[i][k-1][1];            went[i][k][0]=went[went[i][k-1][0]][k-1][0];            bgo[i][k][0]=bgo[went[i][k-1][0]][k-1][0]+bgo[i][k-1][0];            ago[i][k][0]=ago[went[i][k-1][0]][k-1][0]+ago[i][k-1][0];        }}int main(){        n=r(); rep(i,1,n) a[i]=r(); a[0]=inf; a[n+1]=-inf;    M.insert((city){0,inf}); M.insert((city){0,inf});    M.insert((city){n+1,-inf}); M.insert((city){n+1,-inf});    init(); bz();    X0=r(); db mn=1e16;ll Id,T;    rep(i,1,n)    {        ll la=0,lb=0;        calc(i,la,lb,X0);        if (!lb)        {            if (mn>1e15) mn=1e15,Id=i;                else if (mn==1e15&&a[Id]<a[i]) Id=i;        }        else         {            db now=(db)la/(db)lb;            if (now<mn) mn=now,Id=i;            else if (now==mn&&a[Id]<a[i]) Id=i;        }    }    printf("%lld\n",Id);    T=r();    while (T--)    {        ll a=r(),b=r(); ll la=0,lb=0;        calc(a,la,lb,b);        printf("%lld %lld\n",la,lb);    }    return 0;}
entry.summary:
自从本蒟蒻知道有NOIP这个比赛以后,就一直非常慌,害怕爆零,结果还是爆零了.

那么NOIP有趣的题目都有什么呢qwq…

entry.title: ldlsn
entry.content:
欢迎来到ldlsn的世界.

这里是一个qdez的小透明,爱好是语言,翻译和OI.

Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day?
Thou art more lovely and more temperate.
Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May,
And summer’s lease hath all too short a date.
Sometime too hot the eye of heaven shines,
And often is his gold complexion dimm’d;
And every fair from fair sometime declines,
By chance or nature’s changing course untrimm’d;
But thy eternal summer shall not fade
Nor lose possession of that fair thou ow’st;
Nor shall Death brag thou wander’st in his shade,
When in eternal lines to time thou grow’st:
So long as men can breathe or eyes can see,
So long lives this, and this gives life to thee.
entry.summary:
欢迎来到ldlsn的世界.

这里是一个qdez的小透明,爱好是语言,翻译和OI.
